snippet.title: Toni's Island Adventure – Trailer
snippet.description:
[PT-BR]
Toni's Island Adventure é um jogo desenvolvido para Game Boy Color, mais de 20 anos após a descontinuidade do console portátil.
O navio de Toni naufraga por conta de uma tempestade implacável no meio do oceano. Surpreendentemente, ele acorda na praia de uma ilha misteriosa, despertado por um macaco curioso. A ilha é habitada por um pequeno povoado de cães que relatam eventos misteriosos e preocupantes que tem acontecido nos últimos tempos. Agora, cabe a Toni ajudá-los a solucionar o mistério, resolvendo puzzles e enfrentando a magia desconhecida da ilha, em troca da promessa de ajuda para retornar à casa.

Campanha no Catarse: https://www.catarse.me/tonis_island?ref=project_link
Substack (PT/BR) – https://tonisisland.substack.com/

–––
[EN]
Toni's Island Adventure is an ode to the nostalgia of Game Boy Color classics like The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening, Pokémon G/S, and Survival Kids.
Developed for Game Boy Color, over 20 years after the discontinuation of the console, it was born from my passion for pixel art and the charms of 8-bit games.
Toni's ship wrecks due to a relentless storm in the middle of the ocean. Surprisingly, he wakes up on the beach of a mysterious island, awakened by a curious monkey. The island is inhabited by a small village of dogs who report mysterious and concerning events that have been happening recently. Now, it's up to Toni to help them solve the mystery, solving puzzles and facing the unknown magic of the island, in exchange for the promise of assistance to return home.

Substack (EN) – https://tonisisland.substack.com/s/pawsome-reports-en
